tns:patch.keyword: Mondrian cache-related exception on Gambia demo
tns:patch.author: apicca
tns:patch.description: need to change the config in qrtz_job_details after we've changed the RefreshMondrianCacheJob's package.

script.lang: update qrtz_job_details set job_class_name = 'org.digijava.kernel.job.cachedtables.RefreshMondrianCacheJob' where job_class_name = 'org.digijava.ampModule.mondrian.job.RefreshMondrianCacheJob'
